title: The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim PC |Easy download|
description:
This is my first torrent, of Skyrim a game that i buyed and that is a bit expensive.

So i said to myself, why not give it to people that want it for free? To download

This you will need a torrent program like Bit torrent or U Torrent. Bit Lord works too.

Tutorial(If you want it with a shortcut on your desktop and it to be in your files):

- Once the torrent is finished downloading, open it. You will see a readme with instructions inside.

Read these or the others, same result.

- Download PowerIso ( http://poweriso.com/ )

- Restart your PC if you did not have PowerIso before.

- Go in the folder called "Skyrim"

- Extract it on your desktop or anywhere but somewhere out of the archive.

- Right click on it and choose poweriso.

- Choose Mount C:/Users/ bla bla bla

- Go to your disc area and you will see it mounted.

- Open it.

- Go to where ever you want your game to be,i chose c:Games

- Go to your desktop

- Make a new folder called Skyrim

- Drag all the files from your iso disc mounted on your PC inside the folder called

skyrim you just created.

- Once its done just drag the skyrim folder where you want your game in your files 

to be EX: c:Games

- Then if you did the file to C:Games, do this. If you didn't, do it with a 

Different location. Go to your desktop and Right click. Do New-> Shortcut and then

Do C:GamesSkyrimSkyrimLauncher.exe. Once again if you did not put the Skyrim

Folder in Games then is your own business.

Then right click on the shortcut and install the game ( It installs for 2 seconds )

If you did not understand check my video tutorial.
---------------------------------------------------

TUTORIAL (If you are too lazy to do all that)

- Open the torrent

- Extract the ISO file on your desktop or somewhere just so at be out of the Archive.

- Download PowerIso ( http://poweriso.com/ )

- Restart your PC if you did not have PowerIso before.

- Choose Mount C:/Users/ bla bla bla

- Go to your disc area and you will see it mounted.

- Open it.

- Go to SkyrimLauncher and launch and install the game. There you go lazy boy now 

each time you will wanna play the game, the disc has to be mounted.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

ANOTHER RANDOM TUTORIAL


Assuming you have something that suppourts extracting .iso (WinRAR will do it):

Step 1: Open the .iso with WinRAR

Step 2: Select "Extract to..."

Step 3: Extract to a folder where you want the game to be (C:My games, etc)

Step 4: Create a shortcut to the SkyrimLauncher.exe found where you extracted the files to.

Step 5:Enjoy

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

OPTION 2: Remount every time

The .iso is a disk image, and can be mounted as a virtual disk.

Step 1: Install VirtualCloneDrive.exe

Step 2: Stare

Step 3: Put Skyrim.iso somewhere you'll always see (Your desktop, perhaps). This will be clicked on to mount it.

Step 4: Mount the .iso (Double click; there might not be a confirmation).

Step 5: Go to Computer --> (there should be a drive Called "Skyrim". Double click this drive)

Step 6: There should be a file called SkyrimLauncher.exe. Create a shortcut to this file and place it on your desktop.

Whenever you wish to play the game, you will need to find the Skyrim.iso file, "mount" it (double click), then click the shortcut on your desktop.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I HOPE I HELPED YOU IT TOOK ME LOT OF TIME DO WRITE THIS MORE THAN 40 MINUTES, IF

THIS DIDN'T HELP YOU, F*CK YOU BUT I STILL HAVE A VIDEO TUTORIAL ON THIS AND IF THIS 

VIDEO TUTORIAL DIDN'T HELP YOU EITHER F*CK YOUR MOM!!!!

Anyways thanks for downloading my torrent if you have and dont forget to check some 

of my other torrents out, perhaps you will like them.

              



                  -  XtremzTorrentz

PEACE
